english.segment1: Lies are sweet and ordinary. Listen closely you'll hear it in me
english.segment2: Find my way back so I can downsize. Stayed up so late I could hear the sun rise. Be it quiet be it soon. When you sleep take my penance. Make me guilty
english.segment3: In your bed beneath my room. The water quickly covers you. Slowly I regain some feeling. My hands are blue my fingers bleeding
english.segment5: In your bed beneath my room. The water quickly covers you. Slowly I regain some feeling. My hands are blue my fingers bleeding
